text:
Disney | Lead Software Engineer | Glendale, CA (Los Angeles) | ONSITE

Hiring application developers and devops engineers to work on the platform that powers high traffic websites such as www.disney.com and www.starwars.com

Tech stack includes Ruby/Rails, Java, Python, Go, React, Vue.js, Kubernetes

Software Engineer: https://jobs.disneycareers.com/job/glendale/lead-software-en... DevOps Engineer: https://jobs.disneycareers.com/job/glendale/lead-software-en...

Apply online or email me directly at dan.mcnevin@disney.com
